name: No Animals Were Hammed
description:
A competitive 4-player couch game where you can hit....
Pigs!
The goal? Shoot and score!
Last player standing is the winner, like your favorite Battle Royale Game...

Hitting pigs it's not even the best part of the game!

You can unlock characters!
Like Vikings, Vegans, Manly Mans and God itself!

All that and more to come!
